title: Kings Mountain National Military Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Open Daily  9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Extended Weekend Hours from Memorial Day to Labor Day  9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. (Weekends Only) All park facilities, including hiking trails close at mentioned times above. Park Closed:Martin Luther King Jr. Day  (January 19, 2015)  Presidents Day (February 16, 2015) Columbus Day (October 12, 2015) Thanksgiving Day (November 26, 2015)Christmas Day New Years Day
